languages.text: "Сам-то я человек маленький, роду низкого! Ваш светлый лик токмо на иконах видал, что в столице, в храмах".
"I'm just a lowborn, a small, humble man! I've only ever seen your lustrous visage on the holy icons in the temples of the capital."
languages.original_text: "Сам-то я человек маленький, роду низкого! Ваш светлый лик токмо на иконах видал, что в столице, в храмах".

traits.locale_text: "I'm just a lowborn, small, humble man! I've only seen your lustrous features in the holy images in the capital, whenever I'd go to a temple there."
"I'm just a lowborn, small, humble man! I've only seen your lustrous features in the holy images in the capital, whenever I'd go to a temple there."
"I'm just a lowborn, small, humble man! I've only ever seen your lustrous visage on the holy icons in the temples of the capital."
"I'm just a lowborn, small, humble man! I've only ever seen your lustrous visage on the holy icons in the temples of the capital."
"I'm just a lowborn, a small, humble man! I've only ever seen your lustrous visage on the holy icons in the temples of the capital."
"I'm just a lowborn, a small, humble man! I've only ever seen your lustrous visage on the holy icons in the temples of the capital."

languages.text: “我只是个卑微的小老百姓，大人！我只在首都神庙的圣像上见过你的光辉形象。”
languages.original_text: "I'm just a lowborn, a small, humble man! I've only ever seen your lustrous visage on the holy icons in the temples of the capital."

traits.locale_text: “我只是个卑微的小老百姓，大人！我只在首都神庙的圣像上见过你的光辉形象。”

languages.text: 「私は卑しく小さい、謙虚な男です！私は都の寺院の聖像の上でしか、あなたの艶やかなお姿を拝見したことがないんです」
languages.original_text: "I'm just a lowborn, a small, humble man! I've only ever seen your lustrous visage on the holy icons in the temples of the capital."

traits.locale_text: 「私は卑しく小さい、謙虚な男です！私は都の寺院の聖像の上でしか、あなたの艶やかなお姿を拝見したことがないんです」

languages.text: «¡Solo soy un plebeyo humilde! Solo he visto su rostro en las efigies sagradas de los templos de la capital».
languages.original_text: "I'm just a lowborn, a small, humble man! I've only ever seen your lustrous visage on the holy icons in the temples of the capital."

traits.locale_text: «¡Solo soy un plebeyo humilde! Solo he visto su rostro en las efigies sagradas de los templos de la capital».

languages.text: "Ich bin nur ein einfacher, demütiger Mann von niederer Geburt! Ich habe Euer glänzendes Gesicht bisher nur auf den heiligen Ikonen in den Tempeln der Hauptstadt gesehen."
languages.original_text: "I'm just a lowborn, a small, humble man! I've only ever seen your lustrous visage on the holy icons in the temples of the capital."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin nur ein einfacher, demütiger Mann von niederer Geburt! Ich habe Euer glänzendes Gesicht bisher nur auf den heiligen Ikonen in den Tempeln der Hauptstadt gesehen."

languages.text: « Je ne suis qu'un de vos humbles serviteurs ! J'ai seulement vu votre illustre visage sur les saintes icônes dans les temples de la capitale. »
languages.original_text: "I'm just a lowborn, a small, humble man! I've only ever seen your lustrous visage on the holy icons in the temples of the capital."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne qu'un de vos humbles serviteurs ! J'ai seulement vu votre illustre visage sur les saintes icônes dans les temples de la capitale. »

languages.text: "Ben böyle âciz, alt tabaka bir kulunuzum! Yüzünüzü başkent tapınaklarının kutsal simgelerinde gördüydüm anca."
languages.original_text: "I'm just a lowborn, a small, humble man! I've only ever seen your lustrous visage on the holy icons in the temples of the capital."

traits.locale_text: "Ben böyle aciz, alt tabaka bir kulunuzum! Yüzünüzü başkent tapınaklarının kutsal simgelerinde gördüydüm anca."
